name: Indian Student Association (ISA)
description: A cultural organization celebrating Indian traditions, festivals, and community at UVA.

name: Data Science and Analytics Club (DSAC)
description: A club focused on data science workshops, analytics competitions, and collaborative ML projects.

name: Girls Who Code (GWC)
description: Supports women in technology through coding workshops, mentorship, and community-building events.

name: Women in Computing Sciences (WiCS)
description: Promotes the advancement and empowerment of women in computing through mentorship and events.

name: Alternative Investment Fund (AIF)
description: A selective student-run fund focused on alternative investments and financial education.

name: Jefferson Society
description: UVA's oldest student organization focused on debate, leadership, and intellectual discussion.

name: Virginia Ke Aashiq (VKA)
description: A competitive Bollywood fusion dance team performing at UVA and intercollegiate competitions.

name: Hoo-Raas
description: A competitive Garba-Raas team performing traditional South Asian dance styles.

name: SEED Consulting
description: A student consulting club providing pro-bono consulting services to nonprofit clients.

name: 180 Degrees Consulting
description: An international consulting organization offering project-based consulting for social impact groups.

name: Virginia Belles
description: An all-female a cappella group performing contemporary music at UVA.

name: Cavalier Marching Band
description: The official marching band of UVA, performing at athletic events and school celebrations.

name: HooHacks
description: UVA's premier hackathon organization supporting coding events and student innovation.

name: Korean Student Association (KSA)
description: A cultural club celebrating Korean heritage through community events and cultural exchange.

name: Cavalier Daily
description: UVA's independent student newspaper featuring writing, photography, editing, and design opportunities.

name: Club Swim at UVA
description: A competitive and recreational swim club for students of all levels.

name: UVA DiShaan
description: A South Asian fusion dance organization performing modern and classical styles at UVA events.

name: UVA Rocketry Club
description: A student engineering team focused on high-powered rocketry design, launches, and aerospace innovation.

name: Muslim Student Association (MSA)
description: A religious and cultural group supporting Muslim students and hosting educational and spiritual events.

name: Hindu Student Association (HSA)
description: A Hindu faith and cultural organization promoting community, worship, and traditional celebrations.

name: Young Life
description: A Christian fellowship group offering mentorship, small groups, and faith-based community building.

name: Asian Student Network at McIntire
description: A professional and cultural organization that supports Asian students in business and commerce at McIntire.

name: Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)
description: UVA’s primary computer science organization offering workshops, coding events, and technical career support.

name: Black Law Students Association (BLSA)
description: An organization supporting Black law students through mentorship, advocacy, and academic and career resources.

name: Cavalier Symphony Orchestra
description: A student symphony orchestra performing classical and contemporary works at UVA.

name: East Coast Showdown
description: A competitive collegiate dance showcase event organized by UVA students.

name: Madison House
description: UVA’s largest student-run volunteer organization offering numerous service and outreach programs.

name: Vietnamese Student Association (VSA)
description: A cultural group celebrating Vietnamese traditions and promoting community among students.

name: Somali Student Association (SSA)
description: An organization representing Somali culture, heritage, and student community on Grounds.

name: Swifties at UVA
description: A fun social club for students who enjoy Taylor Swift’s music, pop culture, and community events.

name: The Baking Club at UVA
description: A student club for people who enjoy baking, sharing recipes, and hosting food-focused social events.

name: The Jefferson Literary and Debating Society
description: UVA’s historic debating society promoting intellectual discourse, debate, and literary engagement since 1825.
